title: Car Club Auto Repair Garage
copy: Developed a responsive and user-friendly website for Car Club Tire and Auto Repair Service using vanilla JavaScript.

title: Paklite E-Commerce Platform
copy: Designed and developed a modern e-commerce website for Paklite, one of Pakistan's largest LED manufacturers, using WordPress and WooCommerce.

title: O2 Clothing Studio
copy: Built a sleek and modern e-commerce website for O2 Clothing Studio using Shopify.

title: Little Lemon: Cross-platform Mobile App
copy: A cross-paltform mobile app for a restaurant, developed using React Native with the Expo framework!

title: Sadiq Superstore Grocery
copy: Developed a responsive and interactive website for Sadiq Superstore, a local grocery store, using vanilla JavaScript.

title: Steel Rebars Manufacturer
copy: Created a professional and user-friendly website for Ikram Steel Industries, a leading manufacturer of steel rebars in Pakistan.
